text: Dang an la nali de yi bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] jianglin tamen [youtai jiaotu], yi zhengshi tamen yi you de jingdian [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] shi, jinguan tamen yiqian chang qidao an la [pai mu sheng lai] zhansheng bu xinyang zhe. Danshi, dang tamen suo renshi de [zhenli] jianglin tamen shi, tamen que fouren. Suo yi, bu xinyang zhe bi zao an la de qianze.
